channel.title: Adding Defence requirements for barrows
channel.description:
I've added defence requirements for all other armours but nothing seems to work with barrows maybe someone else knows my problem this is how the code looks: EDIT: I got it working although i'm sure this isn't the proper way to do it, but it works now kids with 1 defence can't wear barrows
case 4716: case 4720: case 4722: c.defenceLevelReq = 70; break;

item.title: Adding Defence requirements for barrows
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Look at your wear item method. Everything in there is processed when a player tries to wear an item. If there are no restrictions, the item will be equipped.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Defence requirements for barrows
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

maybe the name dose not contain 's so just change to;

if (itemName.contains("dharok")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 70; } if (itemName.contains("verac")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 70; } if (itemName.contains("torag")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 70; } if (itemName.contains("ahrim")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 70; } if (itemName.contains("guthan")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 70; } if (itemName.contains("karil")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 70; }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Defence requirements for barrows
item.dc:creator: @jman3177 jman3177
item.description:
@jman3177 wrote:

I’ve added defence requirements for all other armours but nothing seems to work with barrows maybe someone else knows my problem
this is how the code looks:

EDIT: I got it working although i’m sure this isn’t the proper way to do it, but it works now kids with 1 defence can’t wear barrows

case 4716: case 4720: case 4722: c.defenceLevelReq = 70; break;

Read full topic
